com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.handler
Interface IHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
IBindingHandler, IImplementationHandler, IInterfaceHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBindingHandler, AbstractHandler, AbstractImplementationHandler, AbstractInterfaceHandler
public interface IHandler

This class provides a common interface for all handlers contributed to the framework.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Returns text that describes the component, reference, service, or interface kind.
 java.lang.String getDescriptiveKindName()
          Returns a string describing the handler kind.
 java.lang.String getKind()
          Returns a string corresponding to a implementation, binding, or interface kind.

          Returns the URL for the large icon resource thet represents the corresponding component, service, reference, or interface kind.

 java.net.URL getSmallIcon()

Method Detail

getKind

java.lang.String getKind()
Returns a string corresponding to a implementation, binding, or interface kind. This string acts as an identifier for a implementation, binding, or interface handler (the handler registered to process the specified kind). For example, in case of java implementation, getKind() will return 'implementation.java'.

Returns:
the QName string of the implementation kind of a component, or the binding kind of an reference or service, or an interface kind of an SCA interface

getDescriptiveKindName

java.lang.String getDescriptiveKindName()
Returns a string describing the handler kind. This string is translated and is suitable for user dialogs and messages. For instance, if a given object can be processed by several different types of handlers, such as component and interface handlers, the user must be presented with a set of available choices. These choices can be worded using the descriptive kind name.

Returns:
the descriptive kind name for this handler

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns a name for the component, reference, service, or interface kind. This string is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
the name of the implementation kind of a component, or the binding kind of an external service or entry point, or the interface kind of an SCA interface.

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns text that describes the component, reference, service, or interface kind. This string is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
the description for the implementation kind of a component, or the binding kind of an external service or entry point, or the interface kind of an SCA interface

getSmallIcon

java.net.URL getSmallIcon()
Returns the URL for the small icon resource thet represents the corresponding component, service, reference, or interface kind. The image is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
URL for icon resource

getLargeIcon

java.net.URL getLargeIcon()
Returns the URL for the large icon resource thet represents the corresponding component, service, reference, or interface kind. The image is intended to be suitable for display to an end user.

Returns:
URL for icon resource
